name: Shodoku
description:
Relax and work your brain in this fun and colorful puzzle game! Each puzzle should take no more than 5 minutes to complete.

The rules of the game are simple: each of the six colors must be present once and only once in each row, column, or block. That's it!

  • No ads!
  • No in-app purchases!
  • Over hundreds of puzzles!

Support development by donating any amount you feel.
